nimbodata.core.auth package¶

Module contents¶

Implements rudimentary login components for use with Flask-Login.

class nimbodata.core.auth.LoginAPI[source]¶

Bases: flask.views.MethodView

Flask view for logging in.

methods = ['POST']¶
post()[source]¶

User provides credentials in POST payload.
